channel.title: Need a hoster pleaseeeee
channel.description:
Yes well i need a hoster for my server, it is just going to start, but i have big plans for it, i have the forums and everything, just the slight detail i cannot host a server neither compile, so i cannot code, so i would really appreciate if someone willing to host and code would post here or contact me on my msn that is
Davilardi@hotmail.com
For hosting, all donations for the server will go to you, and also you will get owner with me in the server, i am planning on a great server with good economy and great community, anyone interested please contact me, i would really appreciate it and if your not interested please do not flame or tell me anything, i dont need your comments, i only need a hoster. Thank you
NEED OF HOSTER -yes-
